title: The Negotiator: The Tale of Victor Kelly
summary: Victor Kelly, aged 59 with hobbies of negotiating and instructing, discovers his superpower of influence and speech which he uses to thwart a corporate espionage plot.
summaryGerman: Victor Kelly, 59 Jahre alt mit den Hobbys Verhandeln und Unterrichten, entdeckt seine Superkraft des Einflusses und der Rede, die er verwendet, um eine Verschwörung zur Unternehmensspionage zu vereiteln.
summaryDutch: Victor Kelly, 59 jaar oud met hobby's onderhandelen en onderwijzen, ontdekt zijn superkracht van invloed en spraak die hij gebruikt om een complot van bedrijfsspionage te dwarsbomen.
summaryFrench: Victor Kelly, âgé de 59 ans avec des passe-temps de négociation et d’enseignement, découvre son super pouvoir d'influence et de parole qu'il utilise pour contrecarrer un complot d'espionnage corporatif.

story.text: Victor spends his morning teaching negotiation tactics at a local community center, feeling energetic and ready to empower others.
During a walk, he overhears a suspicious conversation about a corporate takeover plan. Victor feels a chill run down his spine, marking the beginning of his eerie adventure.
Using his expert negotiation skills, Victor arranges a meeting with the potential evildoers. He finds the talk intriguing and strategizes in the background.
He gathers more evidence by instructing his sources discreetly, managing to keep the mission undercover.
Victor feels triumphant as he exposes the culprits during a high-stakes meeting, using just his words and tactics learned over the years.
The community celebrates Victor’s success. He spends the day sharing his experience and excitement with others, feeling the joy of a hero.
Reflecting on his week, Victor continues his usual activities but remains alert and ready, knowing his skills are forever valuable.

ending: In the silence of his room, Victor Kelly smiled, ready for whatever would come next.
moral: The true power of a superhero lies not just in physical strength, but in wisdom and the ability to influence.
